body.name: Coldairsoap Portable Mini Thermal Printer,Label Makers &Inkless Pocket Printer with 10 Rolls Thermal Paper for Study,Photo, Travel,DIY, Office,Festival Gifts(Printing Paper *10, White)

Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 13 hrs 36 mins
features: ☺️High Quality Packaging Includes: 1 * portable mini thermal printer, 5 * thermal paper rolls, 5 * adhesive paper rolls, 1 * USB charging cable, and 1 * user manual. High quality printing paper, enough for your daily use! (There are 10 rolls in the packaging of the mini portable printer and 1 roll in the printer)

😆Save Money and Time: This mini sticker printer machine brings you a brand new image and text printing experience. Compared to other printers, our mini portable printer is an inkless printer, and you don't need to purchase any ink or toner. It can help you save more money and time, and improve work efficiency.

😉Simple Steps to Operate: Search for and download the application "Tiny Printer" in the app store, then long press the portable thermal printer switch for three seconds, wait for the green indicator light to flash, turn on the Bluetooth device on the phone, finally open the application and click "Connect" to start your label making and image text printing.

📷Easy to Carry &Collect: Compared to traditional large printers, our portable mini printer has a size of 3.4x3.4x1.5in. It has simple and fashionable colors, and only half the size of a phone, making it easy to carry and collect. You can put it in your pocket or bag and take it anywhere, making it easy to take it out without feeling tired.

🎁Multi Functional and Versatile: The portable thermal printer can print photos, study and work notes, shopping lists, DIY stickers, store labels and more, making them both practical and fun. Undoubtedly, it is a special gift for children, friends, family, DIY enthusiasts on Children's Day, Valentine's Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and more. You deserve a mini portable printer even more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely fun, great app
reviews.reviewText: I think of this primarily as a source of entertainment. I can't think of any urgent use case I have for it, but I can think of a million fun things to do with it. It isn't disappointing.It's a very simple device. Plug it in via USB C, charge it, use it, whether it's plugged in or not. It prints over bluetooth using the "TinyPrint" app. That app is surprisingly good: it will print stuff out of your photos, with convenient cropping, off the web, from a stockpile of line art. It even has an AI engine that you can describe something, and it will come up with an image and then print it. Not bad at all.The print quality is...fine. This is the same type of printing you get at cash registers, but it looks better than those do. It doesn't look like it came out of a laser printer or anything. Great for clip art, labels, etc. I printed some pictures, and they are certainly recognizable, but not impressive. I have printed a bunch of things on regular paper with it, and they are fun, but not that useful. The use case I have found that is more useful is printing labels with pictures and things on adhesive paper. I can think of a ton of things I'd like to put labels on. For example, I have a bunch of kids and they all want their picture and/or name on their stuff.This set comes with 6 rolls of regular paper and 5 of sticker paper. Use is way easy. Just open it, pop in the paper, hit print on your phone. There is no aligning, calibrating, buttons, or anything else to mess with. You couldn't find a simpler little printer. One thing I did notice is that you have to put the paper in curing away from the front--this heat-paper has a side that gets printed on and one that doesn't. Once you know this, there is nothing else to know with this printer.I have had a ton of fun with it so far. I don't have to print out receipts for a business or anything, so there isn't anything here I *need*, but I have had a lot of fun with it already, and will likely come up with some things I feel like I need printed.For me, this is just an outrageously fun toy. I'm sure someone actually needs it, but for most people, it's just a great little toy. Seems like this type of paper is easy to find as well. Yet another plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have been looking forward to this mini portable printer since I received it. Its battery is very durable and can be used for several days on a single charge. The compact shell design makes it convenient for me to carry it with me when I go out.This is a very cool little toy, perfect for decorating and writing diaries! Also upgraded my notes. I used it to print many cute stickers and classroom notes.The quality of the 10 rolls of stickers that come with the printer is particularly good, and the stickers and thermal paper have a great texture. Overall, this is a great portable printer. I plan to buy one for my friend as a gift as well!
